name: preveltekit
description: PrevelteKit is a lightweight, high-performance web application framework built on Svelte 5, featuring Server-Side Pre Rendering (SSPR) using Rsbuild and jsdom
author: Thomas Bocek

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/** && mkdir -p dist/default && tsc && cp src/Router.svelte src/types.d.ts dist/ && cp -r default dist/
scripts.docs: pnpm run build && rm -rf docs/* && cd example && pnpm install && pnpm run build-no-zip && cd dist && cp -r . ../../docs/
